name: Sample 122
description:
Рost-apocalypse, pandemic

Virus outbreak decimates the world. The survivors separated into two warring blocks: City, that still tries to find the cure by any means and Wasteland, that is learning the rules of a New World.

You will control two different characters. Both of them are trying to survive in the post-apocalyptic world their own controversial ways.

Read a story and make crucial choices that influence the ending and characters’ destiny
